original_text: And the Canaanite, the king of Arad, who lived in the Negeb in the land of Canaan, heard of the coming of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 남방에 살고 있는 가나안 사람 아랏 왕은 이스라엘 자손이 온다는 소식을 들었더라

sentences.original_text: And the Canaanite, the king of Arad,
who lived in the Negeb in the land of Canaan,
heard of the coming of the people of Israel.
